channel.title: UBC Integrated Engineers
channel.description: Student run website of the UBC Integrated Engineers. This site is a resource for current students, prospective students, alumni and industry members.

item.title: Pitted Power Motor
item.description:
We are constructing an attachable surfboard motor. This will help new surfers battle currents and large waves. It will also be useful to those with disabilities, surf instructors, or those who find paddling tiring.

Team Members

  • David Keller
  • Denny Lee
  • Geneva Gordon
  • Aaron Kopelow
  • Shiv Mittal

item.title: Smart Bathtub
item.description:
Smart Bathtub project is designed to enhance the bathing experience of people by providing remote access to bathtub using a cell phone or a tablet to control automatic-fill, temperature adjustments and jet settings. Sponsoring company: Valley Acrylic

Team Members

  • Aahil Shaikh
  • Faheem Naser
  • Bana Batshon
  • Ata Basaran
  • Tan Hatipoglu
  • Tom Pauw
  • Tony Rainaldi
  • Saif Al-Sulaiman

item.title: Modulo
item.description:
Helmet mounted motorcycle accessories and smart helmets are limited in functionality because of their need for power. Modulo is a helmet mounted device which provides constant power to all rider devices.

Team Members

  • Kiel Olver
  • Cobi Yu
  • Cyrus Larsen
  • Katherine Wong
  • Conor Macdonald
  • Gabriela Roestandy

This is a New Venture Design (NVD) project

item.title: Pro-Lock
item.description:
A programmable deadbolt lock, capable of using multiple keys.

Team Members

  • Michael Harvey
  • Tom Smyth
  • Greg Henderson

item.title: High Radiation Vacuum Beamline Connection System
item.description:
The High Radiation Vacuum Beamline Connection System (HRVBCS) will streamline the process of changing vacuum seals and clamping beamlines for TRIUMF's ARIEL project. The HRVBCS will unclamp, remove the used seal from, place a new seal on, and re-clamp the beamline from a vertical distance of two meters. This shortens the seal change time by up to 80%, reducing time employees are exposed to harmful radiation and increasing the accuracy in which the seal is placed.

Team Members

  • Andrew Li
  • Daniel Vecino Perez
  • Danny George, Devin Husslage
  • Felipe Luna, Ian Jones
  • Kushagra Sharma
  • Tharesh Liyanage

item.title: Easy Breaks
item.description:
Easy to install, easy to use, universal brake system for long-boards

item.title: Project LandLatch
item.description:
LandLatch is a visual feedback landing system to be used in conjunction with the existing Matrice 100 (M100) drone platform manufactured by DJI Drones and supplied to our group by Spire Aerobotics Inc. The LandLatch system utilizes bottom mounted cameras, a lightweight ultrasonic sensor and a powerful Intel processor to capture real-time visual data and aid the M100 flight controller in making intelligent flight maneuvers to land the drone safely and autonomously. This project is built in C++ and incorporates both the OpenCV and DJI Onboard SDK programming libraries.

Team Members

  • Jesse Macht
  • John Robert MacKenzie
  • Mathieu Haiart
  • Patrick Crawford

item.title: Electric Generator
item.description:
Convert the 'wasted' kinetic energy of human motion to electrical energy through magnetic induction. We aim to generate and store enough power to charge a phone battery.

Team Members

  • Dylan Niebergal
  • Jordan Priest
  • MD Rassas
  • AJ Schmidt
  • Quinn Wildi

item.title: The Coaster
item.description:
A coaster that counts the amount of drinks consumed and displays that number on the coaster. It also notifies bartenders of drinks needing refills and excess alcohol consumption.

Team Members

  • Madeleine Brown
  • Jason Miller
  • Luis Vargas
  • Ryan Stewart

item.title: PerfectGear
item.description:
PerfectGear is an innovative approach to the automation of the common bicycle. The project will include the development and implementation of an affordable, efficient, and autonomous gear shifting system for a variety of bikes, allowing for a streamlined and more enjoyable riding experience.

Team Members

  • Joseph Gustafson
  • Sam Lai
  • Kate Mason
  • Cameron Yuen
  • Vivienne Jaehn-Kreibaum
  • Avtar Mandaher
